Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 54th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2010...
Injured on 5/22/2012 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/25/2012 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/12/2013 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/2014 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2015, off Hisashi Iwakuma (LAN)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2015...
Hit first career homerun on 8/27/2016, off Zack Von Rosenberg (NYN)...
Traded from San Francisco to Los Angeles (A) on 7/31/2017 (Going to SF: P A. Cabrera. Going to LAA: P N. Broxton)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
